country.name: China
country.overview: China is a populous nation in East Asia whose vast landscape encompasses grassland, desert, mountains, lakes, rivers and more than 14,000km of coastline. Capital Beijing mixes modern architecture with historic sites such as the Forbidden City palace complex and Tiananmen Square. Shanghai is a skyscraper-studded global financial center. The iconic Great Wall of China runs east-west across the country's north.

translations.name: တရုတ်ပြည်သူ့သမ္မတနိုင်ငံ
Cộng hòa Nhân dân Trung Hoa
Orílẹ̀-èdè Olómìnira àwọn Ará ilẹ̀ Ṣáínà

geography.location_description: Eastern Asia, bordering the East China Sea, Korea Bay, Yellow Sea, and South China Sea, between North Korea and Vietnam
geography.climate: extremely diverse; tropical in south to subarctic in north
geography.terrain: mostly mountains, high plateaus, deserts in west; plains, deltas, and hills in east
geography.hazards: frequent typhoons (about five per year along southern and eastern coasts); damaging floods; tsunamis; earthquakes; droughts; land subsidence
geography.notes: world's fourth largest country (after Russia, Canada, and US) and largest country situated entirely in Asia; Mount Everest on the border with Nepal is the world's tallest peak
